name: Agent in the Night
description:
This game was maded especially for #RetrogradeJam 3.

You have two levels (yes I'm a lazy newbie) to go through as an agent fighting enemies and obstacles. The less health you have, the stronger you become, so you choose to sacrifice your life to get stronger, or be safe but weak.

Controls:

Move - Arrows

Crouch - Down Arrow Key

Jump - or Up Arrow Key

Shoot -

P.s It's better to play without a fullscreen
